overview:
Revantha provides software and solutions for the Nondestructive Testing (NDT) industry.

Revantha has expertise in working with a range of NDT techniques including Ultrasound, X-Ray, Eddy Current, Ground Penetrating Radar and Impact Echo. Lucid offers 2 product platforms Muulam and Kovid and develops custom software.
